title: Under the 7 eyed masked
body: I and just wondering if there is a photo or a description of what master yi's face looked like befor he put the mask on I read his lore he got it to apply his swordsman ship better but they ever realy gave out a discription of what his faced looked like originally I know this has nothing to do with any thing with the game I was just wondering what it actually looked like under the {{champion:11}} mask :)

replies.body:
As far as I know, this is the closest we have ever gotten to seeing his face:

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/7968d146c1ccdb8172ef86c76eef7bc9.jpg
